message: Let's divide fairly, considering the inflation, I'll take 60% and you take 40% to account for the larger depreciation on your end.
Your offer was a good starting point, Alice. However, the inflation affects me more significantly. I propose a 48/52 split to better reflect the decreasing value over time.
Considering the increased impact of inflation, I'll adjust my initial offer slightly, giving you a bit more to compensate for the difference.
